title: nIlOtpalAmbikE nitya
sahitya:
nIlOtpalAmbikE nitya shuddhAtmikE mAmava


anupallavi

 trilOkajanani tribhuvana mOhini trailOkya cakravAsini sadguruguha vishvAsini


caraNam   mAyA prapancAtIta svarUpiNi mucukunda bhakta pAlini varadAyini
chAyAgauLa rAgamOdini niranjani sAyujyadAyini saccidAnanda rUpiNi
